original_text: Then some of the men began to spit on Jesus. They covered his eyes with a cloth and they hit him many times with their fists. They said, ‘Show us that you are a prophet! Tell us who hit you!’ Then the guards took hold of Jesus and they beat him.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 그에게 침을 뱉으며 그의 얼굴을 가리고 주먹으로 치며 이르되 선지자 노릇을 하라 하고 하인들은 손바닥으로 치더라

sentences.original_text: Then some of the men began to spit on Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 어떤 사람들이 예수에게 침을 뱉기 시작했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They covered his eyes with a cloth
and they hit him many times with their fists.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 주먹으로 여러 번 그를 때렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: They said, 'Show us that you are a prophet!'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말했습니다, '당신이 선지자라는 것을 우리에게 보여주세요!'

sentences.original_text: Then the guards took hold of Jesus
